parameters.name: secret_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration to successful application for API access

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API system, which is slightly more prominent in the interface due to the access_token

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Digital signature (Generated as shown in pic)

response_fields.name: result_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for url GET request by each sharing

response_fields.name: sign
response_fields.description: Share retrieval sign for url sharing

response_fields.name: urls
response_fields.description: Request access interface for all links

response_fields.name: expire
response_fields.description: Time of the live in local language

response_fields.name: country
response_fields.description: The three digit code representing the country and state of the live

response_fields.name: country_pos
response_fields.description: The original area of the live in the being position_country_pos
